description:
This Dblog is an amalgam of Forestry + Gatsby + GHub + Fleek + IPFS

It's teleology is to report on the trends, tinkering, and evolution of NFT as a use case of Web3 and smart-contract technology, peer-to-peer networks, & content-based types of information. We believe self-imposed Sybil attacks are a feature and not a bug.
cta: To get started, import this site into Forestry or checkout the repository here.
